Today on the Causeway Coast, White Park Bay and Portballintrae are working with 4 ft @10s W swell and fresh 17 mph SSW winds. Look for the best conditions between 08:45 and 15:55. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 4 ft @11s WNW swell and light 7 mph S winds, making it a great day for a surf. The day after brings a solid 5 ft @12s WNW swell with similar light winds, perfect for catching some fun waves. Best: tomorrow.
